articles.title: Swimming Australia appoints Stockwell as president - Reuters
articles.description: Swimming Australia has named three-times Olympic champion Tracy Stockwell as its new president, the appointment coming in the wake of a recent apology for its treatment of women and girls on national teams.

articles.title: UK finance sector gender parity to take 30 years at current pace -study - Reuters.com
